answers.answer: oooooo i wish you luck!!! i'm patiently waiting too with the hopes of doing it all natural. walk, walk, have sex, walk, walk... and walk. that was the suggestion from my doc. :)

Wow, that is almost identical to my story! Was due june 16, and docs won't let me go past 41 due to GD but i really don't want to be induced so I'm walking, sexing, bouncing on a yoga ball,  drinking raspberry leaf tea and taking primrose oil to try and induce naturally. I have an appt Friday where they'll do a membrane sweep to try and get things rolling.  Good luck!
Thanks you guys! I've been nipple stimulating and walking today. I was having pretty painful contractions this morning but they stopped so I'm trying to get them going again! Good luck to you guys!

question: Today/yesterday was my due date (the 17th). My husband and I have been trying to induce labor naturally for a few days and I've been having contractions but they are always inconsistent and never progress. It's super frustrating it's like my body is teasing me. Maybe I just can't go into labor myself for some reason. Anyways my doctors appointment is Friday and they are going to set an induction date because they won't let me go past 41 weeks because of my gestational diabetes. I'm guessing it will be set for Monday. Till then I'm going to try and induce myself because I want to go natural no epidural and I know the pitocin makes labor way more painful. But im telling myself i can still do it. Every time I shift in bed I feel like my bones are breaking and I just want him here!I've hadLoose stoolContractions/some painfulNauseaI was able to sleep longer then I've slept in a while last nightA LOT of pressureIncrease in dischargeBaby has dropped some but not fully1cm 60% effaced -3 station as of last FridayPraying it happens soon!
title: setting an induction date friday
